alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 8:28AM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches are possible in heavier snow showers. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will continue into the morning as road crews continue to clear roads. Use caution, reduce speed and increase distances!
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
